snippet: Couples visit studios to act out romantic fantasies in what has become a trend in New York, just as it is in China.
abstract: Several photography studios throughout New York City offer couples, mainly Chinese-Americans, chance to enact fantasy video version of their courtships and subsequent engagements and weddings; trend, already popular in China, has spread to United States; one company offering service is Paris Wedding Center, which has three locations in Chinatown and Flushing, Queens.
lead_paragraph: Couples visit studios to act out romantic fantasies in what has become a trend in New York, just as it is in China.

headline.main: Fairy Tale Romances, Real and Staged
